products.title: Dapple Solar Cream 127mm Vertical Blind
products.description: This range of fabrics feature an effective reflective treatment to the reverse of the fabric to reduce heat and glare keeping your room pleasant in the height of summer whilst also being effective for privacy. This cream vertical blind is ideal for rooms that get a lot of sun as the solar coating will help to reflect the light away from your furnishings. products.title: Nile Grained Stonewash Real Wood
products.description: Their nile range comprises of gorgeous natural stained wood tones or fantastic trend-setting painted slats. This stonewash nile wooden blind combines medium grey tones with a darker grey wash effect to create this stand-out wooden blind. At swiftdirectblinds their quality made to measure wooden blinds come with not only customer-first service, but a fantastic five year guarantee for extra peace of mind.
